item.title: Add a user to the wheel group in OSX
item.description: Why are these things always so weird? Someday I'll understand why OSX is set up that way. And on that day, I'll probably weep. $ sudo /usr/bin/dscl . -append /groups/wheel GroupMembership username This was found here :Â https://discussions.apple.com/thread/1230828?start=0&tstart=0
